DOC.detailed_description: To assess intra individual biological variability serum urinary cartilage specific biomarkers define best standardized condition blood urine sampling frame biomarkers dosage . Variation factor assess : - Fasting condition - Sampling time - Sampling season - Physical activity - Duration temperature total blood treatment - Type blood collection tube .
